春待月: (はるまちづき) - twelfth lunar month

春意: (しゅんい) - tranquil mood of spring/feeling of spring; sexual desire
春慶塗: (しゅんけいぬり) - Shunkei lacquerware; lacquerware created using transparent lacquer on yellow- or red-stained wood, allowing the natural wood grain to be seen
春慶塗り: (しゅんけいぬり) - Shunkei lacquerware; lacquerware created using transparent lacquer on yellow- or red-stained wood, allowing the natural wood grain to be seen
春手袋: (はるてぶくろ) - light-weight gloves used in spring

春日祭: (かすがまつり) - Kasuga Festival (held at Kasuga Taisha Shrine in Nara on March 13)
春日遅々: (しゅんじつちち) - (yoji) spring day being long and balmy; serene spring day
春日遅遅: (しゅんじつちち) - (yoji) spring day being long and balmy; serene spring day
春昼: (しゅんちゅう) - spring day (which seems long and quiet)
春時雨: (はるしぐれ) - spring rain; spring shower; spring drizzle
春暁: (shungyou) - amanhecer de primavera, amanhecer de um dia de primavera
春暑し: (はるあつし) - summer-like (e.g. of weather in late spring)
春暖: (しゅんだん) - warm spring weather; spring warmth
春暖炉: (はるだんろ) - fireplace used in springtime

春眠: (しゅんみん) - deep sleep; sleep soundly
春眠暁を覚えず: (しゅんみんあかつきをおぼえず) - (proverb) In spring one sleeps a sleep that knows no dawn; In spring one sleeps like a log; spring nights are the perfect temperature for sleeping so it's easy to oversleep
春社: (しゅんしゃ) - spring "tsuchinoe" day that falls closest to the vernal equinox (a day of religious significance for harvests)

春秋戦国時代: (しゅんじゅうせんごくじだい) - the Spring and Autumn period and the Warring States period (Chinese history)
春秋時代: (しゅんじゅうじだい) - Spring and Autumn period (of Chinese history, approx. 770-403 BCE)
春窮: (しゅんきゅう) - spring staple shortage (before the harvest of rice, wheat, barley, etc.)

昨夕: (さくゆう) - yesterday evening; last night
